title: My Buy Order has not been reflected in my GStocks PH account. What do I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [I withdrew funds from my GStocks PH account to my GCash wallet but they have not been reflected yet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41043122312857-I-withdrew-funds-from-my-GStocks-PH-account-to-my-GCash-wallet-but-they-have-not-been-reflected-yet-What-do-I-do)
- [My Sell Order has not been reflected in my GStocks PH Wallet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41042765699353-My-Sell-Order-has-not-been-reflected-in-my-GStocks-PH-Wallet-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t access my GStocks PH account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31219924239769-I-can-t-access-my-GStocks-PH-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t open an account in GStocks PH. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31220488898329-I-can-t-open-an-account-in-GStocks-PH-What-do-I-do)
- [How can I follow up on my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31221554401945-How-can-I-follow-up-on-my-GStocks-PH-account)
- [I topped up my GStocks PH Wallet but it has not been reflected yet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31221859259417-I-topped-up-my-GStocks-PH-Wallet-but-it-has-not-been-reflected-yet-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t buy or sell in GStocks PH. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31223103981209-I-can-t-buy-or-sell-in-GStocks-PH-What-do-I-do)
- [My Buy Order has not been reflected in my GStocks PH account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31256477945369-My-Buy-Order-has-not-been-reflected-in-my-GStocks-PH-account-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you made a **Buy Order** and it has not been reflected, first check if your available funds and assets are enough for the order.

### **When placing a Buy Order, remember to:**

- Follow the applicable Lot Size and Price Fluctuation for your chosen stock as described in the Board Lot table
- Submit your trade orders within the correct market hours corresponding to the PSE Trading Hours

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41094670393881)

- Follow the price ceiling and price floor limitations as implemented by PSE

Note:

The PSE trading hours are from **9:30 am to 12:00 pm** and **1:00 pm to 3:00 pm** Philippine Standard Time (GMT+08:00), from Monday to Friday (excluding holidays).

If your Buy Order still has not been reflected, please [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gstocks_ph__i_have_a_problem_with_my_gstocks_ph_transaction&tf_22405932372249=wealth_txn_buy)

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I buy PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17532438364057)
- [How can I sell PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210966987161)
- [How do I check the status of my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211043753497)
